text:
October 9, 1952
Br. Bobert Burton Bouse, Chancellor
University of North Carolina
Chapel Hill, North Carolina
Dear Chancellor House:
The National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters is seeking a new Executive Director* The name of
Hr. Earl Wynn, Communications Center, University of
North Carolina, has been suggested to us.
The person we seek is one interested in education —
in educational radio and television, one who has administrative
ability, personality, imagination, and proven leadership.
For the special committee considering the
possible candidates, would you be kind enough to give us
your impressions and evaluations of Hr. Wynn for the
position.
For your information, I might explain that NAEB
Is an association of practically all educational radio and
television stations in the USA.
Tour kindness will be appreciated.
Sincerely yours,
FES 8 fmh
Frank E. Sohooley
Treasurer
